text: is a Japanese athlete. He is best known as a figure skater. Takahashi was born in Kurashiki, Okayama. ==Career== Takahashi won the Japanese national championships in 2006 and 2007. Takahashi is the first male skater from Japan to win the World Junior Championships and the first male skater from Japan to win a silver medal at the World Championship. He was a member of the Japanese team at the 2006 Winter Olympics at Turin in Italy. In 2010, he won a bronze medal in the Winter Olympic Games at Vancouver in Canada.Sports Reference.com (SR/Olympics), "Daisuke Takahashi" ; retrieved 2012-7-23. ==Related pages== * Sports in Japan * Japan at the Olympics ==References== == Other websites == * Daisuke Takahashi at International Skating Union (ISU) Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese figure skaters Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Japan Category:People from Okayama Prefecture
title: Daisuke Takahashi
